meanings.sent1: She started yeuking after eating the spoiled food.
meanings.sent2: The smell of the garbage made him yeuking uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The baby found joy in yeuking peas all over the high chair.
meanings.sent4: The horror movie was so scary, it felt like it was yeuking my stomach.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride was so intense, it felt like I was yeuking my fear away.

meanings.definition: The act of vomiting or retching.
meanings.sent1: His yeuking was loud and messy, causing everyone to look away.
meanings.sent2: The smell in the room indicated recent yeuking had occurred.
meanings.sent3: The sound of yeuking echoed through the empty hallway, startling the janitor.
meanings.sent4: The yeuking at the party was a clear sign that the food was not good.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the dog's yeuking made the children giggle uncontrollably.
